ygData.msgSnippet: Wildrider swerves, and stops right in front of Dead-End, spitting rocks and dust into his frame. Ha ha ha, sure, ride me if you dare . He Proclaims.

Subject: Re: Air and Ground
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider swerves, and stops right in front of Dead-End, spitting rocks and
dust into his frame. "Ha ha ha, sure, ride me if you dare". He Proclaims.
Speedbreaker just arrives at the battle fiel with Drag Strip. "What did we
miss?" he asks. "Everything and nothing" responds Wildrider, "Lets get back
to base".
